title: Campus Auto Rental Service (CARS) | Transportation | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: The Campus Auto Rental Service (CARS) provides vehicles for rental on a daily, weekly or monthly basis. We offer sedans, 7-passenger vans, 9-passenger vans, and 15-passenger vans for use by UIC faculty, staff, and student employees. Vehicles are to be used by employees for conducting University business ONLY.
Please see Business and Financial Policies and Procedures Section 15 - Use of University Motor Vehicles for University rules and eligibility requirements.

As a means of cost recovery on adjustments to vehicle maintenance and replacement costs, the Campus Auto Rental Service (CARS) has found it necessary to increase its rates of its fleet effective FY16. The new rates can be found on the CARS Rates page.
Call the CARS Reservation Office at (312) 996-2886 (6-AUTO) to reserve a vehicle. Please have the following information available:
You may pick-up your vehicle on the day of your reservation during CARS business hours:
If you need to leave before 7:00AM, please come in the day prior to complete your reservation. If you are leaving on Saturday or Sunday, please come in on the Friday prior.
You MUST bring the following items with you:
Upon return, fill out the mileage card and bring the card and vehicle keys into the office. After office hours, you may use key drop box in the rear of the Transportation facility.
If you are unable to return on your specified day, please inform the CARS office as soon as possible at (312) 996-2886. You may be charged for additional days.
If you have reserved a vehicle, you must cancel the reservation no later than 24-hours prior to your scheduled pick-up date. Otherwise, a one-day rental will be charged to your account.
The CARS office is located in the Transportation Facility (View Map).
Address: Transportation Facility (MC 269), 1351 South Morgan Street, Chicago, IL 60607
Office Hours: 7:00 am to 4:30 pm (CT) Monday through Friday
